hubris:Hubris.NAME: Hubris
hubris:Hubris.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Autoplay. NL Shuffle a random Curse into your draw pile. NL Purge. Soulbound.

hubris:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
hubris:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your hand, NL then draw that many cards. NL Purge.

hubris:NaturalOne.NAME: Natural One
hubris:NaturalOne.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy. NL Soulbound.

hubris:Greed.NAME: Greed
hubris:Greed.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Permanently add a copy of this card to your deck. Gain !M! extra gold at the end of combat for each Greed in your deck.

hubris:SlightOfHand.NAME: Sleight of Hand
hubris:SlightOfHand.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL It costs 0 until played.

hubris:Wrath.NAME: Wrath
hubris:Wrath.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Place a copy of this card into your discard pile.

hubris:EnhanceAbility.NAME: Enhance Ability
hubris:EnhanceAbility.DESCRIPTION: Gain either !M! Strength, !M! Dexterity, !M! Focus, or !M!0  Temporary HP.

hubris:Sloth.NAME: Sloth
hubris:Sloth.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Lose all max energy. Gain 1 max energy at the end of each turn.

hubris:StunningStrike.NAME: Stunning Strike
hubris:StunningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Stun the enemy for !M! turn. NL Exhaust.

hubris:Ssssneak.NAME: Ssssneak
hubris:Ssssneak.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Draw additional cards equal to this card's cost. NL Snecko.
hubris:Ssssneak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Draw additional cards equal to double this card's cost. NL Snecko.

hubris:SpecializedCircuitry.NAME: Specialized Circuitry
hubris:SpecializedCircuitry.DESCRIPTION: Choose a type of orb. NL Anytime you Channel an orb, Channel the chosen type instead.
hubris:SpecializedCircuitry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose a type of orb. NL Anytime you Channel an orb, Channel the chosen type instead.

hubris:Counter.NAME: Counter
hubris:Counter.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to attack, deal damage equal to its intended damage.

hubris:ReadiedAction.NAME: Readied Action
hubris:ReadiedAction.DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn, Retain up to !M! card. NL It costs 1 less Energy next turn.
hubris:ReadiedAction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn, Retain up to !M! cards. NL They cost 1 less Energy next turn.

hubris:CleavingFinish.NAME: Cleaving Finish
hubris:CleavingFinish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, this card stays in your hand and costs 0 for the turn.

hubris:Ukulele.NAME: Ukulele
hubris:Ukulele.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Lightning you currently have Channeled.

hubris:Prefetch.NAME: Prefetch
hubris:Prefetch.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. It is Innate for the next combat. NL Exhaust.

hubris:Lust.NAME: Lust
hubris:Lust.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Choose a random enemy. This turn, any time you attack that enemy, lose !M! HP.

hubris:Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
hubris:Gluttony.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, all cards Exhaust.

hubris:Envy.NAME: Envy
hubris:Envy.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL A random card in your hand becomes Unplayable for the turn.

hubris:SpiceAddiction.NAME: SPICE
hubris:SpiceAddiction.DESCRIPTION: Obtain the Spice relic instead of this card.

hubris:Compulsion.NAME: Compulsion
hubris:Compulsion.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, chooses a random card in your hand. You must play that card before any other.

hubris:DoWhile.NAME: Do While
hubris:DoWhile.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next card is repeated at NL +1 [E] until you run out of [E].

hubris:TrickCloak.NAME: Trick Cloak
hubris:TrickCloak.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a random card from your discard pile. NL Draw !M! card.
hubris:TrickCloak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch a card from your discard pile. NL Draw !M! card.

hubris:Fate.NAME: Fate
hubris:Fate.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random [#ff2626]Upgraded[] [#ff2626]Black[] cards to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.

hubris:InfiniteBlow.NAME: Infinite Blow
hubris:InfiniteBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Maintains [#efc851]upgrades[] between runs.

hubris:Despair.NAME: Despair
hubris:Despair.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Each time you shuffle your draw pile, this card is placed on top. NL Grave.

hubris:Disease.NAME: Disease
hubris:Disease.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain NL At the end of your turn, put a copy of this card into your discard pile.

hubris:SharpeningStone.NAME: Sharpening Stone
hubris:SharpeningStone.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack in hand, it gains Piercing for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.
hubris:SharpeningStone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! Attacks in hand, they gain Piercing for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.

hubris:Rewind.NAME: Rewind
hubris:Rewind.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Replay every card you've played this combat. NL Purge.
hubris:Rewind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Replay every card you've played this combat. NL Purge.
